alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bladen and northern Robeson Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buie, or 8 miles southeast of Red Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Red Springs, Pembroke, St. Pauls, Rex, Shannon, Buie, Robeson Community College, Tobermory, Wakulla, Barker Ten Mile, Prospect, Parkton, Rennert and Lumber Bridge. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 13 and 18, and between mile markers 20 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
